tasks.label: Deploy to iPhone
tasks.command: dotnet build -f net10.0-ios -r ios-arm64 -c Debug && xcrun devicectl device install app --device DEA3A6BB-07E8-56BE-9438-6025EF4758F5 bin/Debug/net10.0-ios/ios-arm64/Famick.HomeManagement.Mobile.app && xcrun devicectl device process launch --device DEA3A6BB-07E8-56BE-9438-6025EF4758F5 com.famick.homemanagement
tasks.detail: Build, install, and launch the MAUI app on Mike's iPhone

tasks.label: Install on iPhone
tasks.command: xcrun devicectl device install app --device DEA3A6BB-07E8-56BE-9438-6025EF4758F5 bin/Debug/net10.0-ios/ios-arm64/Famick.HomeManagement.Mobile.app
tasks.detail: Install app on Mike's iPhone (requires prior build)

tasks.label: Launch on iPhone
tasks.command: xcrun devicectl device process launch --device DEA3A6BB-07E8-56BE-9438-6025EF4758F5 com.famick.homemanagement
tasks.detail: Launch the app on Mike's iPhone
